definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Its function is to route a downlink by means of the most efficient air-ground subnetwork .
sentences.chinese: 它的職能是路線下行的手段最有效的空地子網。

sentences.english: Devices also may use the authentication mechanism to establish two-party secure subnetworks .
sentences.chinese: 設備也能使用認證機制，建立兩方的安全子網。

sentences.english: Each sub-network takes on a part of classification function.
sentences.chinese: 每個子網實現一部分分類功能。

sentences.english: Here, we select some transients as the inputs of the parallel subnetworks.
sentences.chinese: 選用篩選後的暫態特徵量作爲各BP子網的輸入。

sentences.english: Check the subnet masks for consistency.
sentences.chinese: 檢查子網掩碼，以確保一致。

sentences.english: Additionally , you can enter a mask to specify the subnet to which an address range belongs.
sentences.chinese: 此外，可輸入掩碼以指定地址範圍所屬的子網。

sentences.english: In particular this Recommendation details the enterprise viewpoint for Subnetwork Connection Management.
sentences.chinese: 特別是本建議細化了子網連接管理的企業觀點。

sentences.english: A more appropriate broadcast address is set to match a specific subnetwork.
sentences.chinese: 更適當的廣播地址設置是匹配特定子網的。

sentences.english: A domain usually pertains to the same subnet.
sentences.chinese: 一個域通常屬於同一個子網。

sentences.english: Ubiquitous digital cash dovetails well with massive electronic networks.
sentences.chinese: 無處不在的數字現金與大規模電子網絡配合默契。

sentences.english: This article is intended as a general introduction to the concepts of IP networks and subnetting.
sentences.chinese: 本文旨在對IP網絡和子網的概念進行一般性介紹。

sentences.english: Each host in a LAN has a subnet mask.
sentences.chinese: 局域網上的每個主機都有一個子網掩碼。

sentences.english: You might also have profiles that correspond to subdomains.
sentences.chinese: 您可能也有配置文件對應的子網域。

sentences.english: The communication to multiple subnets occurs seamlessly.
sentences.chinese: 可以無縫地訪問多個子網。

sentences.english: Private subnet configuration between head node and compute nodes.
sentences.chinese: 配置頭節點和計算節點之間的子網。

sentences.english: Zoning splits a SAN into multiple, isolated subnetworks.
sentences.chinese: 分區聖分割成多個獨立的子網。
